    @allure.story("Cancel Transaction Button Check")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.CRITICAL)
    @pytest.mark.ui
    @pytest.mark.regression
    def test_calculation_amount(self, page_with_screenshot, scenario, payment_mode, slab, amount, excel_client_code,
                                excel_environment, ensure_db_updated):
        logger = LogGen.loggen("Calculation")
        """Test the cancel transaction button functionality."""
        timestamp = datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
        allure.dynamic.title(
            f"Calculation Testing | Scenario={scenario} | Mode={payment_mode} | Slab={slab} | Amount={amount}"
        )
        logger.info(f"--- Starting calculation Test for {scenario} | {payment_mode} | {slab} | {amount} ---")
    
        bill_amount = conv_charges = total_amount = txn_id = "N/A"
        status = "Fail"
    
        try:
            if payment_mode == "UPI INTENT":
                viewport_size = {"width": 375, "height": 667}  # Example: iPhone-like dimensions
                page_with_screenshot.set_viewport_size(viewport_size)
                logger.info(
                    f"Set viewport size to {viewport_size['width']}x{viewport_size['height']} for UPI INTENT mode")
                allure.attach(page_with_screenshot.screenshot(), name="UPI Intent Initial Viewport",
                              attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.PNG)
    
    
            # Initialize page objects
            client = ClientPage(page_with_screenshot)
            client_details = ClientDetailsPage(page_with_screenshot)
            pg = PaymentGatewayPage(page_with_screenshot)
            pg_response = PaymentGatewayResponsePage(page_with_screenshot)
    
            # Fill and verify client and payer details
            fill_and_verify_client_details(self.logger, client, client_details, excel_client_code, excel_environment)
            fill_payer_details(
                logger, client_details, ReadConfig.get_payer_first_name(),
                ReadConfig.get_payer_last_name(), str(amount), ReadConfig.get_payer_phone(),
                ReadConfig.get_payer_email()
            )
    
            # Get transaction ID
            with allure.step(f"Accessing the Client_txn_id"):
                txn_id = client_details.get_value("_client_transaction_id")
                allure.attach(txn_id, name=f"Client Transaction ID for {excel_client_code}",
                              attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
    
            # Click Pay button
            with allure.step("Clicking Pay Button"):
                logger.info("Clicking Pay button")
                client_details.click("_pay_btn")
    
            time.sleep(5)
    
            # Handle payment mode and get amounts
            bill_amount, conv_charges, total_amount = self._handle_payment_mode(pg, payment_mode, logger)
    
    
            #time.sleep(10)
    
            # Handle failure for specific scenario and slab
            # if scenario in ["S8", "S13", "S16", "S24", "S21"] and slab == "5001-10000":
            #     status = "Fail"
            #     with allure.step("transaction is aborted for scenario and slab"):

            #             name="Failure",
            #             attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT
            #         )
            #     pytest.fail(f"Scenario={scenario}, Slab={slab} →  test as failed ")
    
            # 🔹 Call the Payment Aborted check here
            status = self._check_payment_aborted(page_with_screenshot)
    
    
    
            # # Wait for page to load and validate URL
            # time.sleep(5)
            # pg_response.page.wait_for_load_state("networkidle")
            # current_url = pg_response.get_current_url()
            # self.logger.info(f"URL after proceed to pay: {current_url}")
            #
            # with allure.step("Validating the Base URL"):
            #     assert validate_base_url(current_url,
            #                              excel_environment), f"Base URL validation failed for {current_url}"
    
    
    
    
    
        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.exception(
                f"Exception occurred during Cancel Transaction Test for {excel_client_code}: {str(e)}")
            allure.attach(str(e), name="Exception Details", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
            raise
    
        finally:
            # Update Excel with results
>           update_excel_results(
                scenario=scenario,
                payment_mode=payment_mode,
                slab=slab,
                request_amount=amount,
                actual_bill=bill_amount,
                conv_charges=conv_charges,
                total_amount=total_amount,
                status=status,
                txn_id=txn_id
            )
